quotes.quote: It’s not that geese can fly. It’s that they choose to.
The goose that lays the golden eggs likes to lay where there are eggs already.
Even if your goose habitually lays golden eggs, it will still be cooked.
What is sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander.
What's good for the goose is good for the gander.
A fox should not be on the jury at a goose's trial.
If you feel the urge, don't be afraid to go on a wild goose chase. What do you think wild geese are for anyway?
The snow goose need not bathe to make itself white. Neither need you do anything but be yourself.
There are no golden geese. There are only fat geese eating the food that could nourish more athletic opportunities for women.
You beat the liver out of a goose to get a pâté; you pound the muscles of a man's cardia to get a philosopher.
Then the geese replaced themselves with six pigs and vanished.
The goose lays the golden egg. Payrolls make consumers.
Geese are white, crows are black. No argument will change this.
Feather by feather the goose is plucked.
To want to meet an author because you like his books is as ridiculous as wanting to meet the goose because you like pate de foie gras.
True effectiveness is a function of two things: what is produced (the golden eggs) and the producing asset (the goose).
The art of plucking the goose without making it cry out has been developed to a high state of perfection at the hands of the war makers.
